typography.colors: Modern color palette with a focus on neutral tones and accent colors for interactive elements.
typography.typography: Sans-serif font with clear hierarchy; larger headings and smaller body text.
typography.spacing: Consistent spacing between elements, likely using a base unit for margins and padding.
typography.visual_hierarchy: Emphasis on cards as primary content holders, with buttons and inputs as secondary elements.

structure.description: The layout follows a modern web dashboard structure with a sidebar on the left and a main content area on the right. The grid system appears to be a two-column layout with the sidebar occupying approximately 20% of the width. The main content area is divided into cards arranged in a grid or flex layout.
structure.grid_system: Two-column layout with sidebar and main content area.
structure.component_hierarchy: Sidebar > Navbar > Main Content > Cards > Buttons/Inputs

typography.colors: Modern color palette with a focus on neutral tones and accent colors for interactive elements.
typography.typography: Sans-serif font with clear hierarchy; larger headings and smaller body text.
typography.spacing: Consistent spacing between elements, likely using a base unit for margins and padding.
typography.visual_hierarchy: Emphasis on cards as primary content holders, with buttons and inputs as secondary elements.

accessibility_notes.a11y_considerations: Ensure keyboard navigability, sufficient color contrast, and ARIA labels for interactive elements.
accessibility_notes.improvements: Add focus indicators for all interactive elements.

prompt_for_platform: For V0 (Vercel), implement a two-column dashboard layout using Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Use flexbox for the sidebar and CSS grid for the main content area. Ensure all buttons have hover and focus states. Implement responsive design with media queries to collapse the sidebar on smaller screens. Use ARIA attributes for accessibility and ensure all text has sufficient contrast.
